text: Cellvibrio diazotrophicus is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped, aerobic and nitrogen-fixing bacterium from the genus of Cellvibrio which has been isolated from the rhizosphere of the plants Plantago winteri and Hordeum secalinum near Münzenberg in Germany. ==References== Category:Pseudomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Cellvibrio diazotrophicus
